episode.title: Diddling Your Feeds
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Topics include the new look and feel in OS X Yosemite (10.10), Google’s new “Material Design” look and feel for Android, smartwatches (including the new ones Google showed at I/O last week), and Dave’s new behind-the-scenes role at The Talk Show.
episode.showNotes:
Topics include the new look and feel in OS X Yosemite (10.10), Google’s new “Material Design” look and feel for Android, smartwatches (including the new ones Google showed at I/O last week), and Dave’s new behind-the-scenes role at The Talk Show.

Sponsored by:

  • File Transporter (coupon codes TTS10 and TTS20)
  • Warby Parker
  • Backblaze

Links:

  • Tobias Frere-Jones on Helvetica Neue as the new system font in Yosemite.
  • "Google Design" — Google shows and describes its new design language.
  • The LG G and Samsung Gear Live watches, running Android Wear.
  • The Moto 320, er, 360.
